name: Rock It With JBird: Sewing 101
description: BEGINNING Do you have visions of runway shows in Milan, Paris, your friends backyard? Or perhaps dreams of redesigning your crib on a dime? Well, the fine lads at Bird Studios are bringing you a fun beginning sewing class, "Rock It With JBird: Sewing 101," for all that have gotten bitten by the bug and are itchin' for some stichin'. This four week course will introduce you into the world of sewing and patterns, get you up and running with projects, and tackling all the sewing desires of your heart. This ain't your grandmas sewing class so please be prepared to have fun, laugh, share, and learn a lil somethin' somethin'. TIME^ Two hour session class meets on Tuesdays or Saturdays 1x per week (That's ONLY $37.50/session) LOCATION Classes are held at Bird Studios in the trendy Old Fourth Ward Midtown Atlanta area (Exact address will be sent to all attendees upon enrollment). MAXIMUM 5 Students/Session* *Note: If you do not have a sewing machine, please do not hesitate to join us, just contact us and arrangements can be made on your behalf at an additional nominal cost. We do encourage you utilizing your own sewing machine if you have one in order to get familiar with it. ^ If you are interested in doing a class for a group, 2x/wk for two weeks, or a Mega Sew Day email us at rockaclass@itsyourworlrockit.com for more info.
